title: Episode 62 - "Warren"
synopsis: The gang takes a road--er, space trip to visit Warren, a hateful hedge who plots to take over Space Ghost's show.  This show features Gary Owens, who originally voiced Space Ghost in the action series.(Synopsis by Hen Solo)

transcript.speaker: Announcer
transcript.dialogue: (intro music) And now back to "The Warren Show".

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: Tell us, Space, what are your superpowers?

transcript.speaker: Gary Owens
transcript.dialogue: (as Space Ghost) I developed a few of my own, I, for example, can leap tall buildings in a single bound, I jump over buildings, I also have x-ray vision, and I can make change for a dollar.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Wait a minute! I don't remember...

transcript.speaker: Gary Owens
transcript.dialogue: I can also bend my thumb, by the way.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I've never been on "Warren"! That guy's a replicant!

transcript.speaker: Gary Owens
transcript.dialogue: I can bend a spoon with my mind, but it has to be a plastic spoon. (TV laughter)

transcript.speaker: Gary Owens
transcript.dialogue: I can't do the real spoon. (TV applause)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: This is such bull! (blasts TV set) I am super-unsatisfied to be replicated in this way! Super-unsatisfied! I need to get to the bottom of this. Come on, boys! Let's take a ride!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Pick me up a hitch-hiker, would'ya?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You're coming with us, Zorak. We'll go see Warren, then we'll swing by the department store and get you some new slacks.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (mocking) "I have x-ray vision and I can make change for a dollar!"

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I could make change for five dollars if I had to.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yup, it's just like I remember it. Oh, look, they put in a Mr. Winters over there. You see, boys, Warren was my mentor. He was the wind beneath my cape. I learned so much that summer. Perhaps... too much. (sound of brakes) L-let's go back. (shifts into reverse, Phantom Cruiser backs up) What am I doing? (brakes) I love Warren! I need to see him. (shifts gears, goes forward again) But he hurts me. (brakes) But I've been replicated. (goes forward again) But he hurts me. (brakes) But, I have been replicated. (grinds gears) (goes forward again)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: There's nothing to see. Now, who wants new slacks?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I don't wear pants, and I don't know anyone who does!

transcript.speaker: Monitor
transcript.dialogue: Welcome Space Ghost. Warren is expecting you.

transcript.speaker: Monitor
transcript.dialogue: You know the rules. No weapons.

transcript.speaker: Monitor
transcript.dialogue: Oh, I see you brought your mantis.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Where's the tub? Can I have this? (sound of glass breaking) Uh, that was broke already.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Before you... close it with medical sutures?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, before I seal it using a powerful space-age adhesive, which I keep in my fanny pack.

transcript.speaker: Monitor
transcript.dialogue: You know the rules. No fanny packs.

transcript.speaker: Monitor
transcript.dialogue: Ladies and gentlemen of the arena, I give you... Warren.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, it's been a long time.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Warren, you had me on your show last night. But I wasn't on your show last night! I was right there in my living room, watching you having me on your show.

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: Ah, that's funny, mantis. Funny bugs like you, talkin' like that in my castle, end up, lookin' for their teeth, two blocks away, on Quinn Street.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak, let me handle this, please.

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: Listen! I can burn you, like the crazy world of Arthur Brown.

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: We're both green, aren't we, Zorak? But I got rays, don't I!? Don't I? Don't I?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: ... to set myself before you today to find out why you've betrayed our sacred covenant.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Who was that you had on your show, because it wasn't me.

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: Aw, yeah. (chuckles) That was just Gary.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Are you tryin' to shuck me?

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: Listen to me! Over there in the corner, you'll find a mystical cauldron. Conjure up Gary and he will appear before you. He knows the answers, to the questions that vex you so. Now I must adjourn, to my sunny spot, ah! (starts to roll away)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Wait, you didn't answer my question! I didn't come here to talk to a cauldron! Warren, wait!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: He seemed like a good enough guy.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Come on, let's hold hands and conjure up this joker.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Gary... Om... (wolf howls in background) Hey, you guys have to do it too, or it won't work.

transcript.speaker: Gary Owens
transcript.dialogue: (in cauldron, as Space Ghost) (laughs) Thank you.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It is not indeed! Do you know who I am? Gary? Take a good look. I'm Space Ghost!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's right, Gary. I'm the real Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, see, I'm the one who flew around the galaxy saving planets, not you! Where do you get off being me?

transcript.speaker: Gary Owens
transcript.dialogue: Uh, in the early days, back when, uh, when Space Ghost was first born, they let me play Space Ghost. And that was what, what a thrill.

transcript.speaker: Gary Owens
transcript.dialogue: Mr. Joe Barbera, and Mr. Fred Silverman, gentlemen who chose me to play you.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Nobody plays me, Jack! I play me.

transcript.speaker: Gary Owens
transcript.dialogue: Moltar? Moltar, I have a picture of you. I have a picture of Zorak over there, when he was just a mild mutant.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hey! Remember when I smashed your camera with that rock?

transcript.speaker: Gary Owens
transcript.dialogue: Oh, yes. It was, what wonder days.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Gary? Can you come home with us, and... be our new dad?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Now, wait just a second! Can't you see? Are ya all blind? Moltar! Zorak! This is all just some demented mind trick brought on by Warren!

transcript.speaker: Gary Owens
transcript.dialogue: I still have got the inviso-belt, I've got that in the trunk of the car right now.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Listen up, you deluded old freak. Don't make me use my power bands on you.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost, uh... you don't have your power bands.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Stay out of this, Moltar. The time has come for me to put a lid on this cosmic crackpot.

transcript.speaker: Gary Owens
transcript.dialogue: This looks like real trouble. Hand me that veeblefetzer.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Here ya go, buddy. (hands Gary a blast rifle)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You're counting on hitting me with that veeblefetzer, aren't you?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Because then you will become me, right.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's just what I thought. Well, here's something you hadn't counted on, Gary. This set of auxiliary power bands, that I had hidden in my space cavity. Prepare for one of my harmful rays. (adjusts his power bands) Hold on a second. (bands make electronic noises; Space Ghost adjusts bands again) (quietly) You're gonna regret having messed with me. (presses button, but no ray, just a clunking sound) Turning it on. (makes sound like electronic flash charging) (quietly) Prepare... for one of my... harmful rays.

transcript.speaker: Gary Owens
transcript.dialogue: (as Gary) Hey, sock it to me!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Pucker up, Gary! (blasts Gary, whose hand is over his ear a la "Laugh-In") (smoke clears) Moltar, haul that to the Phantom Cruiser.

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: (slides into view) No!! You've destroyed my creation!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Warren, you used that greasy replicant to lure me back here, didn't you?

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: Well... (laughs) (dramatic sting music) Never mind why. The past is just the future that already happened. Now come on over here and I'll cradle you.

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: (to Moltar) Not you! (to Space Ghost) You!

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: Often we fear what we don't understand, Space Ghost. Come closer to me!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (to himself: I must be out of my nut! What am I doing here? And why is Warren smelling me?)

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: How're ya folks and all them? (edges closer to Space Ghost)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: They're... all... kind of... uh... uh...

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: Why don't you take your cape off? Ha!

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: Listen to me! Love and fear are often... the same thing. (sniffs)

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: Don't thank me. Just... (sniffs) hold me.

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: I'm Warren! Is everybody gettin' enough carbon dioxide?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Aha! That's why you brought me here! So you could steal my show! But you already have a show! Why, Warren, why?

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: Well, you know, uh... (laughs) I just felt like it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, you greedy manipulating yard shrub. I'm not going to let your Warren impostinator steal my show right out from under me (reaches for his power bands)

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: But Space Ghost... How do you know that I'm not the impostinator?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well... you've lost me there, Warren. And now you must pay, you hateful hedge. (blasts Warren)

transcript.speaker: Monitor
transcript.dialogue: You've destroyed Warren. I'm tellin'. You've destroyed Warren. I'm tellin'.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That was good. What else is on?

transcript.speaker: Announcer
transcript.dialogue: (intro music) And now back to "The Warren Show".

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: Tell us, Space, what are your superpowers?

transcript.speaker: Gary Owens
transcript.dialogue: Moltar? Moltar, I have a picture of you. I have a picture of Zorak over there, when he was just a mild mutant.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hey! Remember when I smashed your camera with that rock?

transcript.speaker: Gary Owens
transcript.dialogue: Oh, yes. It was, what wonder days.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Gary? Can you come home with us, and... be our new dad?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Now, wait just a second! Can't you see? Are ya all blind? Moltar! Zorak! This is all just some demented mind trick brought on by Warren!

transcript.speaker: Gary Owens
transcript.dialogue: I still have got the inviso-belt, I've got that in the trunk of the car right now.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Listen up, you deluded old freak. Don't make me use my power bands on you.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost, uh... you don't have your power bands.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Stay out of this, Moltar. The time has come for me to put a lid on this cosmic crackpot.

transcript.speaker: Gary Owens
transcript.dialogue: This looks like real trouble. Hand me that veeblefetzer.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Here ya go, buddy. (hands Gary a blast rifle)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You're counting on hitting me with that veeblefetzer, aren't you?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Because then you will become me, right.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's just what I thought. Well, here's something you hadn't counted on, Gary. This set of auxiliary power bands, that I had hidden in my space cavity. Prepare for one of my harmful rays. (adjusts his power bands) Hold on a second. (bands make electronic noises; Space Ghost adjusts bands again) (quietly) You're gonna regret having messed with me. (presses button, but no ray, just a clunking sound) Turning it on. (makes sound like electronic flash charging) (quietly) Prepare... for one of my... harmful rays.

transcript.speaker: Gary Owens
transcript.dialogue: (as Gary) Hey, sock it to me!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Pucker up, Gary! (blasts Gary, whose hand is over his ear a la "Laugh-In") (smoke clears) Moltar, haul that to the Phantom Cruiser.

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: (slides into view) No!! You've destroyed my creation!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Warren, you used that greasy replicant to lure me back here, didn't you?

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: Well... (laughs) (dramatic sting music) Never mind why. The past is just the future that already happened. Now come on over here and I'll cradle you.

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: (to Moltar) Not you! (to Space Ghost) You!

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: Often we fear what we don't understand, Space Ghost. Come closer to me!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (to himself: I must be out of my nut! What am I doing here? And why is Warren smelling me?)

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: How're ya folks and all them? (edges closer to Space Ghost)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: They're... all... kind of... uh... uh...

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: Why don't you take your cape off? Ha!

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: Listen to me! Love and fear are often... the same thing. (sniffs)

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: Don't thank me. Just... (sniffs) hold me.

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: I'm Warren! Is everybody gettin' enough carbon dioxide?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Aha! That's why you brought me here! So you could steal my show! But you already have a show! Why, Warren, why?

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: Well, you know, uh... (laughs) I just felt like it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, you greedy manipulating yard shrub. I'm not going to let your Warren impostinator steal my show right out from under me (reaches for his power bands)

transcript.speaker: Warren
transcript.dialogue: But Space Ghost... How do you know that I'm not the impostinator?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well... you've lost me there, Warren. And now you must pay, you hateful hedge. (blasts Warren)

transcript.speaker: Monitor
transcript.dialogue: You've destroyed Warren. I'm tellin'. You've destroyed Warren. I'm tellin'.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That was good. What else is on?
